control.description-key: Controls Event form field visibility based on Event Type configuration

property.name: boundField
property.description-key: Text field to attach this control to (control reads Event Type internally)

property.name: eventTypeFieldName
property.description-key: Logical name of the Event Type lookup field (default: sprk_eventtype)

property.name: controlStatus
property.description-key: Current status of the form controller
